content: If wealth is lost, nothing is lost. If health is lost, something is lost. If character is lost, everything is lost.
Don't indulge in self-praise. Your good deeds will speak for themselves.
Prosperity is not attained by earning money, but by building good character and clean thinking.
Protect your good name rather than wealth, your becoming wrecked and falling in the eyes of other people.
Knowing the character of anybody, it does not remain difficult to know who are his friends.
A lie is ultimately a lie, it will be exposed tomorrow, if not today. When falsehood is exposed, it completely destroys man's respect.
Honesty is like a banyan tree, which takes a long time to grow but is permanent.
